remarks: A variant of ~ onovuni with indexed unions.  (Contributed by Eric Schmidt, 26-May-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 5-Dec-2016.)
statement:
onovuni.1 $e |- ( Lim y -> ( A F y ) = U_ x e. y ( A F x ) ) $.
onovuni.2 $e |- ( ( x e. On /\ y e. On /\ x C_ y ) -> ( A F x ) C_ ( A F y ) ) $.
onoviun $p |- ( ( K e. T /\ A. z e. K L e. On /\ K =/= (/) ) -> ( A F U_ z e. K L ) = U_ z e. K ( A F L ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d F x y z $.
$d K x y z $.
$d L x y $.
